Text: This is the real deal.  However, the lighting is bad in the first one and there is a pesky shower curtain in the way of the 2nd.  Still, if you wanted to see Bryci giving head and getting fucked, this is your dream come true.

So I found the pic set this morning, and then posted it on Reddit, since it hadn't been posted before.  Someone asked for a link to the video, so I linked both off of xvideos.  So then I get an email from a guy claiming to be Bryci's husband, telling me to remove them, and claiming I stole them.  I thought he was a fake, so I told him if they were private, then he shouldn't have been a dumbass and posted his wife sucking his cock online in the first place.

So I found out he actually was the wife, and out of generosity I deleted it.  But he still claims theft even though I found them on a site where someone ELSE had posted them.  Something was said about hard work and losing money, blah blah blah.  I didn't realize taking pics of your wife pussy was such hard work.  I also didn't realize I was stealing money from him.  He's not losing money,  he's just not making as much as he would like to scamming pictures of his wife's pussy on the internet.  

Oh well, I still get the videos anyway.
Sorry, meant "he actually was the husband"

Thank you my friend, thank you very much!

You made my dream come true. From now on I should address to you as my personal hero.

Long live and god bless.

And if you can, keep them coming.

Yeah, her husband has quite the rep online for being a real tool.  She did some nudies and one or two sex vids as Tia Teen before she was Bryci, and if people ask about them he goes crazy.  Thing is, the implants and the makeover were 100% effective.  She's a hot little number now, and was just average before.  I don't think it hurts who she is now, to have those out there.  She looks way different.
